# Order.ascending

**Case**

A sort ordering that starts with the lowest value and monotonically proceeds to higher values.

## Declaration

```swift
case ascending
```

## Getting the Properties

- **Order.descending**: A sort ordering that starts with the highest value and monotonically proceeds to lower values.
- **areOrdered(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the comparable types match the order’s state.

items.description: A sort ordering that starts with the highest value and monotonically proceeds to lower values.
items.name: Order.descending

items.description: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the comparable types match the order’s state.
